title: How to Earn Money by Posting on Social Media (STEEM Guide)
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Introductory guide for newcomers explaining how STEEM cryptocurrency rewards work, and strategies for building voting power over time

core_concept.not_gofundme: No one is giving you their money
core_concept.upvote_mechanism: People click upvote (like button) and money is GENERATED via STEEM
core_concept.posting_as_mining: Posting on Steemit is to STEEM what mining is to Bitcoin
core_concept.conversion_path: STEEM → Bitcoin → USD (via Coinbase) → Bank account

earning_methods.posting: Main content creation - $ amount shown at bottom of post

curating.definition: Voting on posts before they get popular

time_advantage.beta_stage: Platform was still in Beta (test product) in 2016

compounding_power.2_years: More people but you have more voting power
compounding_power.5_years: Even more people, even more voting power
compounding_power.10_years: Like Facebook/Twitter scale but with veteran voting power

time_advantage.first_mover: First cryptocurrency offering simple GUI for earning (vs complicated mining)

buy_and_load.benefit: Immediately able to boost others' posts
buy_and_load.ripple_effect: One person's votes help many others build power

group_strategy.method: Use Steemit as a coordinated group
progression: Start voting on each other's posts
Help each other rise in rankings
Give each other cents, then $0.10-0.20, then $1.00
After years: $10-50 votes for each other
group_strategy.acceleration: Group members buying STEEM speeds the process
group_strategy.buying_strategy: Buy when going DOWN and when LOW, sell when RISING

meritocracy_concern.risk_1: Members upvoting unworthy content at full power
meritocracy_concern.risk_2: Resentment when told contribution isn't worthy

rhetorical_question: How many times have you been paid by Facebook or Twitter for a post?

historical_context.status: Extremely new but with huge staying power
historical_context.evolution: Later forked to HIVE (2020) after centralization concerns

quiz_questions.q: How is posting on Steemit like mining Bitcoin?
quiz_questions.a: Both generate cryptocurrency - posting creates STEEM, mining creates BTC
quiz_questions.explanation: First platform to offer simple GUI for earning crypto without technical mining

quiz_questions.q: What is the optimal time to buy STEEM?
quiz_questions.a: When it's going DOWN and when it's already LOW
quiz_questions.explanation: Buy low, sell when rising - not the other way around

quiz_questions.q: Why does early adoption matter on STEEM?
quiz_questions.a: Voting power compounds over time - 2 years, 5 years, 10 years of growth
quiz_questions.explanation: Early users have more power as platform scales

achievement_unlocks: STEEM Initiate: Understand the basic earning mechanism
Voting Strategist: Know how to build power over time

van_kush_connection.author: marsresident is Van Kush Family STEEM account
van_kush_connection.relevance: This guide was entry point for many into Van Kush ecosystem
van_kush_connection.continuity: Same principles now apply to HIVE, BLURT, and HIVE-Engine tokens
van_kush_connection.philosophy: Building collective wealth through coordinated action
